name: Indy AI by Contra
tagline: Job boards are dead. Your network is alive
description: Indy AI flips how independents find work. It connects to your LinkedIn and X, scans your extended network, and surfaces warm opportunities in your Contra feed. No job boards. No hustle. Just real opportunities from people you already know.

name: Asteroid
tagline: AI browser agents for your back office, built in seconds
description: Asteroid lets anyone build highly custom, complex AI browser agents. Both non-technical users and engineers can now reliably automate back office browser tasks 20x faster with Asteroid’s web-based agent builder, API integration, and more.

name: Embeddable
tagline: Build interactive tools for your website by chatting with AI
description: Build interactive tools like forms, popups, quizzes, and scratch cards to boost engagement and convert more leads. No code needed. Just type a prompt, customize the result, and embed a lightweight, SEO-friendly script on your site in minutes.

name: Voice Agents by Perspective AI
tagline: Research teams trusts. Conversations customers love.
description: Your customers have a lot to say. Let them say it. Voice Agents lets your customers talk naturally—anytime, anywhere, in any language. Researchers say it's the fastest way to get honest insights, and they've never felt more connected to their customers.

name: involve.me AI Agent
tagline: Create and edit interactive funnels by chatting with AI
description: involve.me just launched the first ever AI Agent that autonomously builds your entire sales and marketing funnel, just by chatting. No learning curve. No code. Just powerful, conversion-ready funnels in seconds, not hours.

name: Writingmate 3.0
tagline: One subscription for all AI models
description: Save money with all in one AI subscription. Chat, code, compare models, search the web and generate images using best LLMs in one place.

name: Flowtica Scribe
tagline: Your ultimate AI note-taker in hand
description: Flowtica Scribe is an AI-powered pen that records audio and lets you highlight key moments with a simple button press. It then generates structured, personalized notes focused on what you decided was important.

name: Qwen-Image
tagline: Stunning images and perfect text
description: Qwen-Image is a new 20B open-source image foundation model by the Qwen team. It excels at complex text rendering (especially Chinese) and precise image editing, while also delivering strong general image generation. Available now in Qwen Chat.

name: Compuser.ai
tagline: AI Computer use agent in your browser
description: Meet Compuser.ai, your AI Computer use agent in your browser that understands screenshots, clicks on buttons, types text, navigates software and helps you get things done — right in your browser.

name: Yume Journal
tagline: Never forget your dreams again
description: Catch your dreams before they fade. Ever wake up and remember a dream just for a moment? It felt real. Maybe strange. Maybe important. Then it slips away. Gone before you can write it down. That’s what Yume is for.

name: Webhookify
tagline: Instant Webhook URLs with AI Powered Notifications
description: Create webhook endpoints instantly & get AI-powered alerts on mobile, Slack, Discord, Telegram or email. Works with Stripe, Shopify, GitHub, RevenueCat & 1000+ platforms. Zero coding needed. Available on web, iOS & Android with free tier.

name: Lovaround
tagline: The map for vibe coders, indie hackers & founders.
description: A community map for vibe coders built with Lovable 💜 Pin yourself, explore others nearby, and connect.

name: Aiarty Video Enhancer
tagline: AI denoise, unblur, restore & upscale video to 4K - locally!
description: Aiarty Video Enhancer redefines desktop video enhancement with advanced AI and Denoise+Deblur algorithms. It sharpens textures, restores low-quality or old videos, and upscales to HD/4K. It also generates new frames for smooth slow motion and fix audio noise.

name: AI Thing
tagline: AI tool for all to run complex tasks in parallel
description: AI Thing is a privacy-first, context-aware desktop tool that helps anyone, technical or not, to perform multiple complex tasks in parallel, with all the assistance they need.

name: Bookov
tagline: A platform for book lovers who value their collections
description: We finally in the AppStore. Bookov is free app for book lovers. Read books & build a library that will be truly yours. You are the owner of your collection

name: AUM
tagline: Your unlimited offline AI Co-Pilot
description: AUM is your fully private enterprise AI brain. Run AI offline on your own infrastructure. Fully private. Fully local. Zero cloud risk. Secure document search, database intelligence, and workflow automation.

name: ScreenFloat
tagline: Your Mac's screen capture power tools
description: ScreenFloat 2 is your powerful screen capture hub. From capturing screenshots and recordings over editing, annotating, redacting and running data-detection on them to storing, organizing and syncing them, ScreenFloat is your all-in-one screen capture tool.

name: Deadline Savior Demo
tagline: Turn your Pomodoro sessions into RPG battles
description: Deadline Savior is a productivity RPG where your real-life focus sessions power your hero in a fantasy world. Turns your daily work into idle turn-based battles, loot collection, and skill progression — all while you stay focused on actual tasks.

name: Biography Studio AI
tagline: Capture your life story beautifully, with AI
description: Turn your life story into a beautifully written book—just by talking. Biography Studio interviews you, writes your story, and creates a book, audiobook, or podcast. Works in any language. No writing required.

name: Earlytap
tagline: Launch Your Product with AI-Powered Landing Page & Waitlist
description: Earlytap helps you launch your product in under 60 seconds. Simply describe your product idea and our AI instantly builds a high-converting landing page, email waitlist, and feedback survey, so you can quickly find your first users and get quality feedback.
